#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

string newstr;

void computelps(int m,int *lps)
{
	int i=0,len=0;
	// len = the longest prefix suffix of previous index;
	
	lps[0]=0;   i=1;
	
	while(i<m)
	{
		if(newstr[i]==newstr[len])
		{
			len++;
			lps[i]=len;
			i++;
		}
		else
		{
			if(len==0)    {   lps[i]=0;   i++;   }
			else           	  len=lps[len-1];
		}
	}
}

int main()
{
  while(cin>>newstr)
  {  
    if(newstr=="End") break;
	int l=newstr.size();
                	
	int *lps= new int[l+1];
	computelps(l,lps);
	
	for(int i=0;i<l;i++)  printf("%d ",lps[i]);
	printf("\n");
  }

 return 0;
}
